did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Index to Fee Book (Montgomery County, VA), 1850-1857
did.abstract: Index to an unidentified fee book with listing of names, years, and page numbers. Index is believed to originate in Montgomery County, Virginia.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Index to Fee Book (Montgomery County, VA) must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Index to Fee Book (Montgomery County, VA), Ms2011-066, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Index to Fee Book (Montgomery County, VA) was completed in August 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Index to an unidentified fee book dating from the 1850s. Pages include a listing of names with column headings of the years 1850 through 1857 with corresponding page numbers. The fee book itself is not included.
The origin of the fee book index was inferred based upon the names which are listed.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.
